characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance (mentioned), Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Sja-anat is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. Also known as The Taker of Secrets, once she touches another spren, that spren acts strangely; it doesn't act like it should.

characterDetails.Appearance: She appears as a jet-black shadow of a person, only with white spots for eyes.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
Sja-anat has a spy, a spren which appears as a shadowy face with red eyes which swims through the water of the Purelake like a fish. Apparently, it is unable to go far without a carrier, so it brings an escort ... a larger spren which reforms itself into a female knight with a Shardblade in her hands.
While a bonded spren could be Enlightened by Sja-anat, it would have dire, ramifications for the bond. It would be much better for this to happen before bonding, but it could happen.
characterDetails.Abilities: Sja-anat refers to her process of touching spren with whom she comes in contact - which has the ability to corrupt them - as Enlightening.
characterDetails.Speculation: *Readers have surmised that Sja-anat's son is likely Renarin's spren, Glys.
characterDetails.Notes:
Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
When asked whether Sja-anat could heal a deadeye by changing them, Brandon said that's going to depend on one's definition of heal. But, that there are definitely some who would call what would occur healing. That they would be different from the way they had been before.
